channel.title: Re: 667: Donator Crown: ingame

item.title: Re: 667: Donator Crown: ingame
item.dc:creator: @Vinnyy Vinnyy
item.description:
@Vinnyy wrote:

UPDATE: Got the donator sign by itself but now every player has it, even if there not a donator… :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm:

} if (rights == 1) { } else if (rights == 0) { Node_Sub50.method2966("<img=8>" + player.method891(false, 1), "<img=8>" + player.method893(false, true), i_290_, string, null, false, 0, player.displayName, i_291_); } else if (rights == 3) { Node_Sub50.method2966("<img=0>" + player.method891(false, 1), "<img=0>" + player.method893(false, true), i_290_, string, null, false, 0, player.displayName, i_291_); } else if (rights == 2 || rights == 7) { Node_Sub50.method2966("<img=1>" + player.method891(false, 1), "<img=1>" + player.method893(false, true), i_290_, string, null, false, 0, player.displayName, i_291_); } else { Node_Sub50.method2966(player.method891(false, 1), player.method893(false, true), i_290_, string, null, false, 0, player.displayName, i_291_); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Re: 667: Donator Crown: ingame
item.dc:creator: @Vinnyy Vinnyy
item.description:
@Vinnyy wrote:

Hello,
I succesfully added an in-game donar crown, but it also picks up the Moderator crown… Can anyone help me fix? This is my FloatBuffer Code…

[CODE] if (rights == 1) {

					} else if (rights == ??) {
						Node_Sub50.method2966("<img=8>" + player.method891(false, 1), "<img=8>" + player.method893(false, true), i_290_, string, null, false, 0, player.displayName, i_291_);
				
						Node_Sub50.method2966("<img=0>" + player.method891(false, 1), "<img=0>" + player.method893(false, true), i_290_, string, null, false, 0, player.displayName, i_291_);
					} else if (rights == 2 || rights == 7) {
					Node_Sub50.method2966("<img=1>" + player.method891(false, 1), "<img=1>" + player.method893(false, true), i_290_, string, null, false, 0, player.displayName, i_291_);
					} else {
						Node_Sub50.method2966(player.method891(false, 1), player.method893(false, true), i_290_, string, null, false, 0, player.displayName, i_291_);	
			}
			}
		}[/CODE]

I’m showing all of the crowns in total, the one that says rights == ?? is donars one… Help anyone?
What the hell is Donars Number? in 667

Read full topic
